author: CTPPS
body:
Backport of PR #13839 from CMSSW 81X

Validation config file using TOTEM-standalone data:

`EventFilter/TotemRawToDigi/test/totem_standalone_raw_data_test.py`

with the expected output:

`EventFilter/TotemRawToDigi/test/totem_standalone_raw_data_test.reference_output`
title: CTPPS: new EventFilter for raw-to-digi conversion of TOTEM RP data - backport of PR #13839
